snippet.title: Bad North: Jotunn Edition PC Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Free content update, available now on PC!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/688420/Bad_North/

Bad North: Jotunn Edition brings exciting new updates to the Viking defense microstrategy game. Unlock traits to empower your commanders and change the flow of battle across playthroughs, acquire new items like explosive mines, take on the challenge of Very Hard difficulty and plenty quality-of-life upgrades in this free content update.
